title: 11/17: Weekend Recap - Lamar Jackson is Quite Good (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
How about those Ravens and how about Lamar Jackson! We start with the best of Week 11 (2:42) with quick thoughts on the best QB in Fantasy, but also thoughts on Josh Allen, Sam Darnold, Joe Mixon, Mark Ingram, John Brown and more ... A look at the big injuries/early Waiver Wire (18:00) with Marlon Mack headlining the list. Which IND RB should we add? Is Randall Cobb worth adding? Who else can help your teams going forward? Then it's on to Winners (23:45) like D.J. Chark and Kenyan Drake and Losers (28:06) such as O.J. Howard and Brian Hill ... We wonder if some players have reached "must-start" status (34:10). Is Kirk Cousins staying in your lineup regardless of matchup? What about DeVante Parker. And then we get the Dropometer out (36:15) for Terry McLaurin, Tom Brady, Ronald Jones and more. And of course we recap each game (40:40) with a "Believe it or Not" from Heath ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Miss anything on Sunday? We've got your back! The top performers, winners and losers from Sunday's games plus an early look at the Waive Wire.
